statements: SELECT * FROM client_progress;
SELECT client_id, therapist_id, session_date, session_duration, treatment_outcome FROM client_progress;
SELECT client_id, therapist_id, session_date FROM client_progress WHERE therapist_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM client_progress WHERE session_duration > 60;
SELECT client_id, treatment_outcome, session_date FROM client_progress ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM client_progress WHERE therapist_id = 1
SELECT client_id, session_date, session_duration FROM client_progress WHERE session_duration > 60
SELECT therapist_id, treatment_outcome FROM client_progress WHERE therapist_id = 2 AND session_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM client_progress WHERE treatment_outcome LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT client_id, session_date FROM client_progress WHERE therapist_id = 3 ORDER BY session_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT client_id, therapist_id, progress_status, treatment_notes FROM client_progress WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_id, progress_status, client_id, treatment_notes FROM client_progress WHERE therapist_id = 5;
SELECT progress_status, client_id, therapist_id, treatment_notes FROM client_progress WHERE client_id = 3 AND therapist_id = 2;
SELECT client_id, therapy_success, session_date FROM treatment_outcomes WHERE client_id = 4;
SELECT therapy_success, session_date, client_id FROM treatment_outcomes WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM client_progress WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT therapist_id, progress_status FROM client_progress WHERE therapist_id = 3;
SELECT client_id, treatment_notes FROM client_progress WHERE progress_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM treatment_outcomes WHERE therapy_success = TRUE ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, session_date FROM treatment_outcomes WHERE client_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, therapy_type FROM clients WHERE therapist_id = '1234';
SELECT client_name, progress_notes FROM clients JOIN progress ON clients.client_id = progress.client_id;
SELECT * FROM treatment_outcomes WHERE duration > 30;
SELECT client_name, therapy_type, successful FROM clients INNER JOIN treatment_outcomes ON clients.client_id = treatment_outcomes.client_id WHERE therapy_type = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT client_id, client_name, therapist_id FROM clients WHERE therapy_type = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE client_id = 'ec513832-0dee-4f3a-bff1-41b2a030902e' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT client_id, successful FROM treatment_outcomes WHERE duration > 30 AND successful = TRUE;
SELECT client_id, progress_notes FROM progress WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM clients JOIN treatment_outcomes ON clients.client_id = treatment_outcomes.client_id WHERE clients.client_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY treatment_outcomes.duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, age FROM clients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT client_name, gender FROM clients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT treatment_name FROM treatments WHERE cost < 100;
SELECT progress_date, progress_notes FROM progress_data ORDER BY progress_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, gender FROM clients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT treatment_name, description, cost FROM treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;

SELECT clients.client_name, treatments.treatment_name, progress_data.progress_date FROM clients JOIN progress_data ON clients.client_id = progress_data.client_id JOIN treatments ON progress_data.treatment_id = treatments.treatment_id;

SELECT clients.client_name, outcomes.outcome_score, outcomes.outcome_notes FROM clients JOIN progress_data ON clients.client_id = progress_data.client_id JOIN outcomes ON progress_data.progress_id = outcomes.progress_id WHERE outcomes.outcome_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM ClientProgress;
SELECT progress_notes, client_id FROM ClientProgress;
SELECT therapist_id, session_date FROM Sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TherapyMethods WHERE method_name='Cognitive Behavioral Therapy';
SELECT therapist_name, therapist_id FROM Therapists ORDER BY therapist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sessions;
SELECT client_id, session_date, progress_notes FROM ClientProgress WHERE client_id = 123 ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT therapist_id, therapist_name FROM Therapists WHERE therapist_name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT method_name FROM TherapyMethods WHERE method_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY method_name ASC;
SELECT client_id, session_date, therapy_methods.method_name FROM Sessions INNER JOIN TherapyMethods ON Sessions.client_id = TherapyMethods.method_id ORDER BY session_date DESC;
